climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: MOISTURIZING BODY LOTION FOR SENSITIVE SKIN : This natural body lotion provides deep moisture, infused with argan oil, shea butter it also contains soothing oatmeal to help calm & protect your skin. Its lightweight formula absorbs quickly into the skin without feeling greasy

EWG VERIFIED BODY LOTION: Based on EWG ingredients evaluation, our clean formula is free of harmful chemicals like Phenoxyethanol, Parabens, Formaldehyde, BHA, BHT, Phthalate, Triclosan, SLS & SLES, Benzyl Alcohol, MIT and synthetic fragrance for your complete peace of mind

MADE FROM NATURE, BOOSTED BY THE SCIENCE: Enriched with argan oil which naturally contains squalene that helps lock in moisture and soothing oatmeal known for its antioxidant & anti-inflammatory properties, our body moisturizer will give your skin a soft and smooth appearance

HYPOALLERGENIC BODY LOTION: Our body moisturizer is dermatologically tested and hypoallergenic. Free of irritants and synthetic fragrance, our sensitive skin body lotion helps protect itchy, delicate skin

ECO-FRIENDLY, VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE BODY LOTION: PETA Approved - Proudly Vegan because our products are never tested on animals. It is also ECOLOGO Certified: sustainable, biodegradable and low aquatic toxicity
body.description: Get radiant skin with ATTITUDE Moisturize & Repair Dry Body Lotion for Sensitive Skin! Enriched with protecting and nourishing argan oil and soothing oatmeal, applying this moisturizing body lotion on your skin will help boost skin hydration and elasticity! Dermatologically tested, hypoallergenic and EWG Verified you will love its lightweight texture that leaves your skin feeling smooth and soothed after every use. Try it now!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Shower Gel Hand Soap Hand Cream Body Cream Deodorant Discover our other oatmeal sensitive natural products Gently cleanses the body Gently removes impurities Nourishes hands Nourishes the skin Eliminates unpleasant odors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Besides the faint smell of oats, it does it’s job and moisturizes. Perfect for fresh tattoos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was a little nervous after reading the reviews about smell but I’ve truly loved every product from Attitude so I gave it a chance and WOW! This is such a great moisturizer. Goes on great and doesn’t linger feeling wet or sticky, smell is not bad at all and the next day I still felt so moisturized! Must try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product. I have been on a journey to switch to a non-toxic lifestyle. I used to use Vaseline cocoa butter lotion and loved it, however this lotion is wonderful. It’s a smaller bottle than the Vaseline bottle but I use less of this lotion for my whole body (only about 5-6 pumps versus ~10+). This lotion is thick and initially leaves a bit of a white cast when you spread it evenly, however within the next 2 minutes it absorbs fully. My skin feels super soft and very moisturized with just one application until my next shower. The scent is also nice and not overwhelming like the greasy Bath and Body Works lotions I also used to use.Highly recommend for anyone wanting make a non-toxic swap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great but smells kinda like cheese
reviews.reviewText: I love attitude products so much and use so many of their products. This lotion works great and I love how it has clean ingredients in it, but….. it kinda smells like cheese. When you first apply it it has an unpleasant cheese like smell to it but that smell fades very quickly once it’s applied to the skin. I would recommend buying one of the scented lotions over this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: ATTITUDE Body Lotion for Sensitive Skin with Oat and Avocado Oil is a very soothing and pleasantly scented lotion. I like that it's EWG certified for gentle ingredients. The scent is very mild- it smells nice but isn't overpowering. It moisturizes nicely and isn't greasy. Will purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: Keeps your skin soft. No harmful ingredients yuka approved

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Smells very strong, not a pleasant smell!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this lotion because of the supposedly clean ingredients and the EWG seal. However, I could not get past the strong, perfume-like smell. I was shocked when I checked the ingredients and saw fragrance listed!! How can this have the EWG seal with toxic fragrance?! Won’t be using this lotion, very disappointed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars feels good, smells bad
reviews.reviewText: Although the lotion feels very good and moisturizing, me and my girlfriend could not tolerate the oatmeal smell. It smells gross and kind of dank to me. I chose this because it was EWG approved, but I'd rather have some extra chemicals for something that smells better, thanks.

reviews.reviewTitle: The best body lotion I’ve ever used!!!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried so many lotions, and this one exceeds them all by far! I got the argon oil one and it smells amazing, first of all! It absorbs super fast and spreads so well, leaving my skin smooth and softer than it’s ever been! It also seems to last throughout the day even in the dry winter climate here in Canada. Some products make my sensitive skin react, but so far every Attitude product I’ve tried hasn’t irritated my skin at all. I’m switching to Attitude products for everything because they are superior to any other brands and I love that they are clean products and are made in Canada!

reviews.reviewTitle: Love that it has no scent at all
reviews.reviewText: Nice thickish cream that spreads easily and absorbs quickly. It is completely scent free which is great . It’s also very gentle on the skin.

Great product feels great on the skin not greasy and love the clean ingredients. Only disappointment was that when it came in the pump was broken. Luckily I had attitude dish soap which has the same pump so I just moved it over when I ran out of dish soap.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good for dry hands, long lasting
reviews.reviewText: I have some aveeno, and this lasts longer and I use half the amount. I do have dry hands that will peel near the nails if I don't apply this. The smell is pleasant as well.
It smells ok straight from the bottle however once the scent wears off it smells gross
